languages.text: "Более чем. Ваши слова вытащили меня из мрака, и я благодарен за это".
"Firmly. It was your words that pulled me out of that darkness, and you have my gratitude."
languages.original_text: "Более чем. Ваши слова вытащили меня из мрака, и я благодарен за это".

traits.locale_text: "Firmly. Your words pulled me out of that darkness, and you have my gratitude."
"Firmly. Your words pulled me out of that darkness, and you have my gratitude."
"Firmly. It was your words that pulled me out of that darkness, and you have my gratitude."
"Firmly. It was your words that pulled me out of that darkness, and you have my gratitude."
"Firmly. It was your words that pulled me out of that darkness, and you have my gratitude."
"Firmly. It was your words that pulled me out of that darkness, and you have my gratitude."

languages.text: 「ええ、しっかりと。あの闇から私を引き上げてくれたのは、あなたの言葉でした。感謝しています」
languages.original_text: "Firmly. It was your words that pulled me out of that darkness, and you have my gratitude."

traits.locale_text: 「ええ、しっかりと。あの闇から私を引き上げてくれたのは、あなたの言葉でした。感謝しています」

languages.text: "Völlig. Eure Worte haben mich aus dieser Dunkelheit geholt, und dafür bin ich Euch dankbar."
languages.original_text: "Firmly. It was your words that pulled me out of that darkness, and you have my gratitude."

traits.locale_text: "Völlig. Eure Worte haben mich aus dieser Dunkelheit geholt, und dafür bin ich Euch dankbar."

languages.text: « Oui, tout à fait. Ce sont vos paroles qui m'ont arraché aux ténèbres et je vous en suis reconnaissant. »
languages.original_text: "Firmly. It was your words that pulled me out of that darkness, and you have my gratitude."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, tout à fait. Ce sont vos paroles qui m'ont arraché aux ténèbres et je vous en suis reconnaissant. »

languages.text: «Sin duda. Fueron sus palabras las que me sacaron de esa oscuridad, y por eso le estoy muy agradecido».
languages.original_text: "Firmly. It was your words that pulled me out of that darkness, and you have my gratitude."

traits.locale_text: «Sin duda. Fueron sus palabras las que me sacaron de esa oscuridad, y por eso le estoy muy agradecido».

languages.text: “我已经彻底走出来了。是你的话将我从黑暗中拉了出来，我对你充满感激。”
languages.original_text: "Firmly. It was your words that pulled me out of that darkness, and you have my gratitude."

traits.locale_text: “我已经彻底走出来了。是你的话将我从黑暗中拉了出来，我对你充满感激。”

languages.text: "Hem de bir daha dağılmayacak şekilde. Beni o karanlıktan çekip çıkaran sizin sözlerinizdi. Minnettarım."
languages.original_text: "Firmly. It was your words that pulled me out of that darkness, and you have my gratitude."

traits.locale_text: "Hem de bir daha dağılmayacak şekilde. Beni o karanlıktan çekip çıkaran sizin sözlerinizdi. Minnettarım."

languages.original_text: "Firmly. It was your words that pulled me out of that darkness, and you have my gratitude."
